name: browser_action
description: Interact with a Puppeteer-controlled browser. Must start with launch and end with close. Use other actions (click, type, scroll_down, scroll_up) in between as needed.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: required, one of [launch, click, type, scroll_down, scroll_up, close].

parameters.name: coordinate
parameters.description: optional, x,y coordinates for click action.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: optional, text to type for type action.
